Articles.Content:
I found this leaked screenshot from the dev builds of Valentina.

![puRNrux.jpg](http://imgur.com/puRNrux.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-22T15:39:50Z" title="03/22/2015 03:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 22, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

> 
> Where! Where! WHEEERE!!!

I'm guessing the Mun, polar regions.

It looks a lot like you photoshopped her head out of this[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111236-Valentina-Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111236-Valentina-Kerman) post.

> 
> It looks a lot like you photoshopped her head out of this[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111236-Valentina-Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111236-Valentina-Kerman) post.

DINGDINGDINGDINGDING! We have a winner!
I knew it was too good to be true!
Wow, that actually looks real! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Gg, Gregrox!
